channel.title: The weirdest dream
channel.description:
It was a cool chilly night, to just explore of the worlds mist. Unfortantly there was a golf field just across by home building and it was very damp and the trees were very fresh so I got out of the room and stright went to the bellcane.As I was taking a breath, a huge plane was headed out toward me. It was very scary and I paniced, huge fires buring the trees down likes hell was unleased through the realm and I see her, the one true love beside me, feeling her soft skin and right before I see anuthor plane coming toward me and boom.
and then so I woke up.

item.title: The weirdest dream
item.dc:creator: @iceburster iceburster
item.description:
@iceburster wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath, post:13, topic:146415”]I have a dream, that one day, people on the Internet will stop making bad jokes.

I have a dream, that one day, descendants of the funny, and descendants of the unfunny, will be able to sit together at the table of lulzdom.

I have a dream, that down in Ohio, with its ignorant rednecks, with the chief redneck having his lips dripping with the words “open-source” and “linux” – one day, right there in Ohio, rednecks will grow to appreciate the power of the lulz.

I have a dream that everything will be funny, and every joke shall be perfected, a true masterpiece of humour. I have a dream that one day rednecks and normal people will be able to join hands and exclaim, “LULZ!”

I have a dream today!

This is my hope, and the hope I go back to the Internets with.

And this will be the day – this will be the day when all of God’s children will be able to sing with new meaning: “STICK IT IN THE POOPER!”

And if MITB is to be a great forum, this must become true.[/quote]
I feel this same way. The whole Mopar community should.

Read full topic

item.title: The weirdest dream
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

And who are you to decide was is and what is not funny? I found it funny. Lulz.

Read full topic

ninja nub:

Thank you, for the first time I laughed at one of your posts.

Shows what kind of sense of humor you have. It wasn’t even funny.

item.title: The weirdest dream
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

I have a dream, that one day, people on the Internet will stop making bad jokes.

I have a dream, that one day, descendants of the funny, and descendants of the unfunny, will be able to sit together at the table of lulzdom.

I have a dream, that down in Ohio, with its ignorant rednecks, with the chief redneck having his lips dripping with the words “open-source” and “linux” – one day, right there in Ohio, rednecks will grow to appreciate the power of the lulz.

I have a dream that everything will be funny, and every joke shall be perfected, a true masterpiece of humour. I have a dream that one day rednecks and normal people will be able to join hands and exclaim, “LULZ!”

I have a dream today!

This is my hope, and the hope I go back to the Internets with.

And this will be the day – this will be the day when all of God’s children will be able to sing with new meaning: “STICK IT IN THE POOPER!”

And if MITB is to be a great forum, this must become true.

Read full topic
